primary.description:
Core: color.core.gray.110
HEX: #000000
Used for main app backgrund for AAOS in all modes

Core: color.core.gray.110
HEX: #000000
Used for inverted text primary.

default.description:
Core: color.core.green.50
HEX: #27a17a
Used for rest state of success, join text

Core: color.core.red.50
HEX: #f55868
Used for rest state of Error/cancel text

Core: color.core.yellow.40
HEX: #f2990a
Used for rest state of warning text; alert-badge, interactive icons.

Core: color.core.blue.50
HEX:#3492eb
Used for rest state of accent text. mostly used for button-hyperlink, interactive-icons, alert-badge

Core:color.core.orange.50
HEX:#EC6400
Used to indicate instability

Core: color.core.white-alpha.00
HEX: #ffffff 00%
Rest state of Secondary buttons.

disabled.description:
Core: color.core.white-alpha.00
HEX: #ffffff 00%
Disabled state of secondary buttons.

default.description:
Core:color.core.green.50
HEX:#27a17a
Rest state of Join buttons.

Core:color.core.red.50
HEX:#f55868
Rest state of error/cancel buttons.

Core: color.core.blue.40
HEX: #64b4fa
Rest state of accent buttons

00.description:
Core:color.core.gray.50
HEX:#8f8f8f
Used for presence (away, on-hold, on-device), meeting indicators(meeting-locked)

Core: color.core.green.50
HEX: #27a17a
Used for Presence(active) and Meeting Indicators (Audio-video-on, Media-quality-good)

Core:color.core.red.50
HEX:#f55868
Used for badge : Presence(DoNotDisturb) and Meeting Indicators (Audio-video-off, Record-on, Poor-media-quality,Live)

Core:color.core.yellow.40
HEX:#f2990a
Used for Meeting Indicators (Audio-error, Video-error)

Core:color.core.blue.50
HEX:#3492eb
Used for meeting indicator (Encryption)

Core: color.core.orange.50
HEX:#EC6400
Used for avatar presence (busy, meeting, call, device)

default.description:
Core: color.core.white-alpha.40
HEX: #ffffff 40%
Used for rest state of toggle-off components background. Do not use it for toggle button.

disabled.description:
Core:color.core.white-alpha.11
HEX: #ffffff 11%
Used for disabled slider

default.description:
Core:color.core.blue.50
HEX:#3492eb
Used for rest state of active control components background. (radio, toggle, checkbox)

00.description:
Core: color.core.green.50
HEX:#27a17a
Used for join/success buttons outline.

Core:color.core.red.50
HEX:#f55868
Used for outline of error/cancel state of input, buttons.

Core:color.core.blue.50
HEX: #3492eb
Used for outline of secondary accent buttons,

Core:color.core.yellow.40
HEX:#f2990a
Used for warning state of input fields border

device.description:
Core: core.decorative.cobalt.70, core.decorative.cyan.40,  core.green.50
HEX: 08599C, 22C7D6, 27A17A
Used for gradient ring of video-halo for mobile
